body: @shadowfairy  owww what a cool story thanks man wait should i assume you're a she anyways never mind

Story: MC dude lost his job, family bankrupt, no money, no girl, nothing. Gets horny and calls for FMC (Akari) who's a prostitute. Expected fake shit girl based on experience, gets actual hot wife instead (calling her a celeb wife). Wife is actually married, husband also lost his job and is mentally ill, and they needed the money, that's why she has ring. She was planning on quitting the shop she's from after their first encounter but MC begs for one last session and she accepts (she finds a new shop that charges way higher than what MC can afford to pay). Afterwards he tries to confess but she stops him and it ends there. MC wishes he could have someone like FMC, moves on with life and starts looking for a job again.

Story: her husband lost his job, and she needs to earn money. But she is not cheating at all. All she wants to do is support her husband, and nothing happens like other ntr shit, like fall in love with others because their dick is big. So, that is the reason why she keeps her ring on.

Maybe her husband is cheating on her and this is her way of revenge. Also, she probably mentions other customers becasue shes simply saying that shes never had a customer fall for her. Lets wait for the translation and see if its all true
